<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Cambria;mso-hansi-theme-font:minor-latin;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">缘起，看到一遍文章，题材取自于《</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:Times;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C++</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Times;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">沉思录》，综合利用好几种设计模式，并且结合所谓的面向对象的技巧，然后洋洋自得，并且在最后，还反问：“有更好的解决方案吗？”。本座暗叹，又一个设计模式的毒害者。以下，就提出另一种解决方案。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:Times;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times",serif;mso-ascii-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">      </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Times;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Times;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">首先，先声明一点，现实中，一张图片，可以给予添加一层又一层片框，也可以和其他的图片组合在一块，或横，或竖，……，但是，图片，始终只有一张，对它处理之后，它就一直是那个样子了，不可能同时看到它的两个样子，或加边框，或和其他照片组合在一块。如果，拿这张图片去进行复制，那又自是另当别论，但那已经是另外一第图片了。当然，对以下例子稍加修改，就能支持修饰的图片的复制操作。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:Times;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times",serif;mso-ascii-font-family:宋体;
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">      </span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Times;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:
16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-hansi-font-family:Times;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">本座最近在写一套消息框架，如果这个例子能用上那套框架，写起来就会很简单。但是，即使没有消息框架的支持，利用消息发送来解决这个问题，也是相当小儿科的事情。为了突出重点，忽略了各种异常处理，没有优化，也不管什么编程风格，纯粹直奔主题。解决这个例子的最重要一点，就在于打印图片时，要一行一行地从顶到底顺次打印下来。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:Times;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"Times",serif;mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;
mso-bidi-font-family:Times;mso-font-kerning:0pt;mso-no-proof:yes"><!--[if gte vml 1]><v:shapetype
 id="_x0000_t75" coordsize="21600,21600" o:spt="75" o:preferrelative="t"
 path="m@4@5l@4@11@9@11@9@5xe" filled="f" stroked="f">
 <v:stroke joinstyle="miter"/>
 <v:formulas>
  <v:f eqn="if lineDrawn pixelLineWidth 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 1 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum 0 0 @1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @2 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @3 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @0 0 1"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @6 1 2"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelWidth"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @8 21600 0"/>
  <v:f eqn="prod @7 21600 pixelHeight"/>
  <v:f eqn="sum @10 21600 0"/>
 </v:formulas>

<p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";mso-fareast-font-family:
宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt">既然原文是指我的博文，我来尝试评价下楼主上面的实现</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt">,</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">如果有不正确的地方，请指正</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:
"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#888888;
mso-font-kerning:0pt">:<br clear="all">
(1)</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt">楼主用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">的方式来模拟</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;
mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt">C++</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">的虚函数，除了以后难维护外，得到了什么好处</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt">?<br clear="all">
(2)Windows</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt">用软命令的方式来实现消息处理函数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt">, </span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">是因为消息类型太多，而且方便以后扩展新消息，我感觉用的恰到好处，但楼主这里也用这种方式就感觉有点过了。如果都按照这种方式，无论什么类都只要一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
"Times New Roman";color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt">CommandHandler</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:"ms shell dlg";
mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;mso-hansi-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:
0pt">函数就够了。我个人觉得一个用途明确的接口才是优雅的设计。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;
font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br clear="all">
(3)</span><span style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
"ms shell dlg";mso-fareast-font-family:宋体;mso-fareast-theme-font:minor-fareast;
mso-hansi-font-family:"ms shell dlg";mso-bidi-font-family:"Times New Roman";
color:#888888;mso-font-kerning:0pt">请问楼主如何处理去边框</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:16.0pt;font-family:"ms shell dlg",serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
